project.name: Zest Sync Player
project.description: AI-Powered Video Player with Automatic Subtitle Generation & Translation

versions.title: GPU Acceleration & Enhanced UI
versions.commit_message: Release v2.1.0: Add GPU support with Zest Sync G variant, enhanced UI, and bug fixes

expandable_details.summary: Major update introducing GPU acceleration for 5-10x faster subtitle generation with enhanced UI improvements.
new_features: 🚀 Zest Sync G - GPU-accelerated version with CUDA support
📱 Responsive UI design with adaptive sizing
⚙️ Scrollable settings panel with better organization
🎨 Font color customization (7 colors: Black, Blue, Green, Orange, Red, White, Yellow)
✨ Text stroke toggle for improved subtitle readability
📊 Real-time progress indicators with toast notifications
🔄 Enhanced system info detection and performance logging
improvements: 🔧 Better model path handling for EXE compatibility
💾 Enhanced memory management for translation models
🎯 Visual queue indicators for playing media
bug_fixes: 🐛 Fixed memory leaks during long processing sessions
🔧 Resolved UI responsiveness issues during subtitle generation
💾 Fixed settings persistence across app restarts
🎮 Improved FFmpeg detection with multiple fallback paths

versions.title: Complete Rewrite with Modern UI
versions.commit_message: Update main.py: Improve model path handling and memory management

expandable_details.summary: Complete application rewrite with PyQt6, introducing AI-powered subtitle generation and modern interface.
new_features: 🎯 Dual Accuracy Modes (Fast/Slow) for speed vs quality optimization
🎓 Interactive Tutorial system for first-time users
🎨 Modern dark interface with smooth animations
📂 Queue management with drag-drop and auto-play
📊 Real-time progress display during subtitle generation
technical_changes: 🔄 Complete rewrite from VLC-based to PyQt6 framework
🔧 Better error handling and logging system
